SEARCH
Package controller

Class AppointmentController

Object
AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentService
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements AppointmentService
Controller responsible for handling appointment-related operations, such as scheduling, rescheduling, cancellation, and retrieving appointment details.

    • getAvailableSlots

      public List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableSlots(LocalDate date, Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves available appointment slots for a given doctor on a specific date. Filters out slots that are already booked.
      Specified by:
      getAvailableSlots in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which to fetch available slots.
      doctor - The doctor for whom the slots need to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A list of available AppointmentSlot objects.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public Appointment scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, AppointmentSlot slot)
      Schedules a new appointment for a patient with a given doctor on a specified slot.
      Specified by:
      scheduleAppointment in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient who is scheduling the appointment.
      doctor - The doctor for the appointment.
      slot - The available appointment slot.
      Returns:
      The scheduled Appointment object, or null if the slot is unavailable.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, AppointmentSlot newSlot)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new available slot.
      Specified by:
      rescheduleAppointment in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newSlot - The new appointment slot.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
      Retrieves a list of scheduled appointments for a patient. Filters out cancelled appointments and returns only future appointments.
      Specified by:
      getScheduledAppointments in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of upcoming appointments for the patient.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments(Doctor doctor)

      Specified by:
      getUpcomingAppointments in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public boolean updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentId, AppointmentStatus status)

      Specified by:
      updateAppointmentStatus in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      status - The new status to set for the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the status was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, String serviceType, List<Prescription> prescriptions, String notes)
      Records the outcome of a confirmed appointment, including service type, prescriptions, and notes.
      Specified by:
      recordAppointmentOutcome in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the confirmed appointment.
      serviceType - The type of service provided during the appointment.
      prescriptions - List of prescriptions given during the appointment.
      notes - Additional notes about the appointment outcome.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the appointment is not confirmed.

      Validates if a status transition is allowed based on the current status.
      Parameters:

      next - The desired status to transition to.
      Returns:
      True if the transition is valid, false otherwise.
